Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: cassowary beak
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: The sharp beak of a cassowary.

values.description: A beak graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a cassowary. A large ornament extends from the top of their beak to their head.

A beak graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a cassowary. A large ornament extends from the top of their beak to their head. [PAWN_nameDef] adapted to move their head around like a bird so the ornament doesn't block their vision.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: A cascade of coarse feathers sprout from [PAWN_nameDef]'s tail.
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: cassowary tailfeathers
